page.title: 02MORE DETAILS OF THE AREA
page.content: Bilton and Sproatley are the main pockets of population in our region, but there are also numerous houses at Wyton and Thirtleby,ranging from small bungalows to large detached houses set in their own grounds. With the exception of the main Hull to Withernsea road that runs through Bilton all the roads in our block are 'B'class roads.There is also quite a number of footpaths offering walks around the villages. The facilities in the region are studied in greater detail in the next pages along with pages about working days of different occupations,visits to two farms,and comments about the children's ideas on school,fashion and entertainment in the 1980's.
